sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import { useCartContext } from '../context/CartContext' export const TableCartFoot = ({total}) => { return ( <> Total $ARS {total} ) } export const TableCart = ({ item, nombre, cantidad, precio, subTotal }) => { const { clearItem } = useCartContext() return ( <> {item} {nombre} {precio} {cantidad} $ARS {subTotal} ) }
